site.TITLE: ironode
site.DESCR: A nodejs website template and user system starter free to clone. Ironode is using Expressjs, Passportjs, Mongoosejs, Handlebarsjs & Bootstrap4.

login.TITLE: Login
login.SUB: Welcome back! You may login either with your local account or any social account.

err.TITLE: Error
err.DISABLED: Account email has not been verified

register.TITLE: Register
register.SUB: We are in danger! Save us! Nothing really special here, feel free to test the registration process.
register.NEWACCOUNTVERIFY: An activation email has been sent to your address.

err.TITLE: Error
err.NUMCHARS: must be at least 6 chars long
err.EVALID: please enter a valid email address
err.UROBOT: Do you belong to the human race?
err.NOEMAIL: Activation email cannot be sent, please contact us.

reset.TITLE: Password Reset
reset.SUB: Please enter your email address. An activation link will be sent to this address.
reset.EMAILSENT: An activation email has been sent to your email address:

err.TITLE: Error
err.EVALID: please enter a valid email address
err.TOOMANY: You have issued too many reset requests.
err.TOOSOON: Please wait a few minutes for the activation email before issuing another request.
err.BADUSER: The activation link is wrong or it has been expired.
err.BADTOKEN: The activation link is wrong or it has been expired.
err.NOTLOCAL: This email address is not registered localy. Please use your social account to sign in.
err.GENERIC: Please enter a valid email address.

profile.TITLE: Profile
profile.SUB: Feel free to update your details. Thank you.
profile.NAME: Name
profile.EMAILSENT: A confirmation email has been sent to your new email address

err.TITLE: Error
err.AVATAR: Please upload an image file up to 1MB.

contact.TITLE: Contact Us
contact.SUB: Communication channels have been restored! Happy to hear from you.
contact.NAME: Name

err.TITLE: Error
err.EVALID: please enter a valid email address

general.MSG404: 404 - I was quietly browsing my logs until you came along.
